title: Stag and Dagger Tip: Egyptian Hip Hop
content:
Having already done a short interview for CitR earlier last month, Manchester founded band Egyptian Hip Hop are set to be another of the large crowd pullers at the Glasgow leg of Stag and Dagger this weekend. Coming off the back of releasing their debut single; Wild Human Child, Hewett and co. are sure to be in their accustomed energetic mood. With the upcoming release of their debut album as well as festival slots at Dot to Dot, Glastonbury and Bestival in the near future, Stag and Dagger may be your last chance to catch Egyptian Hip Hop in an intimate venue.

Check Out Egyptian Hip Hop’s Myspace

Buy Tickets For Stag And Dagger
